ygData.subject: Re: everquest dating for single gamers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmmm.... /em ponders Jim s words.... I m not interested in that kind of club... Which part poses the problem, the Michigan, the Single, the
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmmm.... /em ponders Jim's words....<br><br>"I'm
not interested in that kind of club..."<br><br>Which
part poses the problem, the Michigan, the Single, the
Straight, the Everquest or the Dating-- or some combination
of the above? Maybe it's just funny to me, but,
reading in context with the invite-- seems like Jim is
saying "I'm a swinger, so I'm not interested in that
club."<br><br>BTW-- I'm prejudiced in favor of Everquest players,
singles, swingers, straight, bent, and Michigan.
<br><br>Is he a bigot for excluding swingers? <br><br>Are we
overbearing for demanding that swingers be
alowed?<br><br>I'll be sure to make my club very specific as to avoid
getting flammed. Come to
www.clubs.yahoo.com/clubs/EQplayerswhomightbesingleorareswingersandliketoplayEQnudeandwatchhipposdoitontheDiscoverychannelandohyeahanyoneelsebecauseIdon'twanttobecalledabigot<br><br>Whoa-- i need some sleep.<br><br>Xela
